Value: (1) Intel® Storage Adapter(1) Low-profile mounting bracket

This controller supports SAS, SATA and PCI (NVMe) drives through 4  SFF-8643 connectors.  Each connector can drive either 4 SAS/SATA drives, or 1 NVMe drive.  This gives 16 SAS/SATA ports, or 4 NVME ports.
